message: Let's split it 50/50 to start. Your turn!
You started high, now I'll try to negotiate
You were too high, now I'm in the driver's seat. Meet me in the middle?
You're trying to squeeze me, but I'm not budging
I'm willing to give you a bit more, but I'm not going to give up too much
I'm not getting desperate, but I'll give you a slightly better offer
I'm not going to give up, I want a better deal for myself
We're getting close to the end, I'll meet you in the middle again
